name: Love Crush Hitch
description:
No matter when, where, with whom, everyone has the chance to earn a date with loved ones. All you have to do is moving your fingers and you’ll see the romantic magic happen.This is a love adventure! Your goal is not to fight monsters and beat the boss. ALL YOU WANT IS TO BECOME A HITCH by mastering the Match-3 game. Although this time, you will experience a new twist on the classic Match-3 gameplay.

Basic Game-play:
** Match objects to launch a romantic attack.
** Match 4 or more to make special romantic attack.
** Chain and combos will brings you more power.

Twist:
** You will meet three attracting people. You have to conquer them all to finally WIN.
** 5 special skills are on your side.

Features:
** Unwrap fancy places and meet 42 sweethearts.
** 5 and more different places to conquer, each with 12 levels.
** Helpful magical power-ups to help with floating your way through the love adventure.
** Complete levels and don’t miss out special treats.
** Lots of outfits to go with your character.
** Lots of weapons to increase your charm.

What a re you waiting for now. Put this on your device and start to become HITCH.
